newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL palm oil ends down on weak fundamentals, soyoil.
newsitem.headline: KL palm oil ends down on weak fundamentals, soyoil.

text.p: PALM OIL FUTURES PALM OIL PHYSICALS
(3rd pos) 1,155 rgt/tonne July (south) 1,195 *
Open/Hi/Low 1,165/ 1,165/1,151 Prev close 1,207.50
Prev settlement 1,169 * sellers prices

PALM OIL FUTURES - Ended weaker on renewed selling due to weak fundamentals and lower Chicago soyoil futures overnight. Further downside expected although a weak ringgit against dollar limiting fall. Oct futures seen testing next support of 1,137-1,142 ringgit.
PALM OIL PHYSICALS - Also weakened. Activity focussed on nearby crude palm oil and RBD palm olein.
Traders said concern about rising stocks continued to cloud the market.
They said production remained robust and offtake was not sufficient to keep stocks from piling up.
Private crop forecaster Ivan Wong has estimated stocks to reach 1.06 million tonnes by end-September. For end-July, he forecast stocks at 865,000-875,000 tonnes.
Official figures from the Palm Oil Registration and Licensing Authority (PORLA) placed stocks at the end of June at 786,123 tonnes.
At the close, third-month October futures contract was down 14 ringgit at 1,155 ringgit ($440.84) a tonne.
Immediate support for the contract is pegged at around 1,137-1,142 ringgit.
Physicals prices were also marked down.
July (south) crude palm oil was offered at 1,195 ringgit ($456.11) a tonne against bids at 1,190. It was traded from 1,195 to 1,190.
July (central) saw offers at 1,185 ringgit against bids at 1,180.
Aug (south) was offered at 1,195 ringgit against bids at 1,190. It was traded from 1,195 to 1,190.
Aug (central) was offered at 1,185 against bids at 1,180. It saw trades at 1,180 and 1,175.
In refined palm oil, Aug RBD palm oil was offered at $485 a tonne FOB Malaysia, Sep at $482.50 and Oct/Nov/Dec also at $482.50.
Aug RBD palm olein saw offers at $522.50, Sep at $517.50 and Oct/Nov/Dec at $515. Aug was traded at $521 and $520, Sep at $515 and Oct/Nov/Dec at $515 and $513.
Aug RBD palm stearin was offered at $365, Sep at $362.50 and Oct/Nov/Dec also at $362.50. Aug was traded at $362.50 and $361.50.
Aug/Sep RBD palm fatty acid distillate saw offers at $290.
-- Kuala Lumpur newsroom (603-201 4813) ($1=2.6200 ringgit)
